text: Her is on þysse Crystes bec siu geswytelung þære healfre hyde æt Pottune þe Ælfhelm Leofsige sealde hys goldsmiþe on lyfe & æfter lyfe to atenne swa hym leofæst sy.

Þonne wæron þas to gewitnesse þe heron geswyteliað, Ælfhelm his hlaford, Byrhtnoþ abbod & Ælfgar munuc & Ælfhelm se gunge & his twegen sunu, Æþelhric & Alfwold, & Wulfmær þæs bisceopes broþar & Ælmær cild & Leofric æt Holewelle & his sunu Godric & Æþelric æt Hernicwelle & Ælfsige preost & his sunu & Osferþ preost.
